elements.2211.03029_dc0f6f206aa47ffd30b430710dc61: Evolution of the afterglow optical spectral shape of GRB 201015A in the first hour]
elements.2211.03029_b9183c0b7c0af1bb063072b1b063a: Instruments such as the ROTSE, TORTORA, Pi of the Sky, MASTER-net, and others have recorded single-band optical flux measurements starting as early as
elements.2211.03029_036667290c4333c55f033cb928ef7: 10 seconds after a gamma-ray burst trigger
elements.2211.03029_9f9a6697d54a914ca9b42b966db8a: The earliest measurements of optical spectral shape have been made only much later, typically on hour time scales, never starting less than a minute after trigger, until now
elements.2211.03029_a86698d094171772d768c30bfbe43: BAT triggerred on GRB201015A, we observed a sharp rise in flux to a peak, followed by an approximate power law decay light curve,
elements.2211.03029_ee83c87fceaf07f206ff4fe940c17: Flux was measured simultaneously in three optical filter bands, g
elements.2211.03029_4078f752165bc9033953a9183a72f: , using our unique instrument mounted on the Nazarbayev University Transient Telescope at Assy-Turgen Astrophysical Observatory (NUTTelA-TAO)
elements.2211.03029_2c1fecaefd6191904021608248227: Our simultaneous multi-band observations of the early afterglow show strong colour evolution from red to blue, with a change in the optical log slope (after correction for Milky Way extinction) of
elements.2211.03029_1d97415d522272e89db37d2652fc1: ; during this time the X-ray log slope remained constant
elements.2211.03029_be5a895e3ec458d26bac7f4b16c54: We did not find evidence for a two-component jet structure or a transition from reverse to forward shock that would explain this change in slope
elements.2211.03029_02b55e3c8edaccde910d49c0ed304: We find that the majority of the optical spectral slope evolution is consistent with a monotonic decay of extinction, evidence of dust destruction
elements.2211.03029_1c94fcd5faf75888c3d36bfcee390: If we assume that the optical log slope is constant throughout this period, with the value given by the late-time slope, and we further assume an SMC-like extinction curve, we derive a change in the local extinction
elements.2211.03029_7bd9f9a8d7b72ccc9f795858eb23d: This work shows that significant information about the early emission phase (and possibly prompt emission, if observed early enough) is being missed without such early observations with simultaneous multi-band instruments.
elements.2211.03029_31848ed863f86681294515310ff05: The prompt phase of a gamma-ray burst (GRB), that during bright and rapidly-varying
elements.2211.03029_81bfbc872ed400e8341a33a1dc49e: -ray emission, is directly associated with a relativistic jet
elements.2211.03029_40342eb285bde5b175c162255870e: Later emission, stemming from the interaction of the explosion with the surrounding medium, is called the afterglow
elements.2211.03029_71ee15de06cdfb55a1e1567c795de: The single-band optical flux of GRBs has been observed as early as
elements.2211.03029_48bbfc030fe6a4fe287737516c7d4: -ray emission; multiple instruments, including ROTSE, TORTORA, Pi of the Sky, and MASTER-net
elements.2211.03029_27fd539142682485f0778e2eea9ba: have made such very early single-band measurements of GRB optical emission
elements.2211.03029_9049239f8d49b561a76d05daef640: Such observations, intended to capture the prompt phase emission, automatically respond to alerts from the space-based
elements.2211.03029_f777a1daea7b57d9d5d9d8ca8a8e0: However, the earliest measurements of the spectral shape were typically made much later, on hour time scales, in the afterglow phase
elements.2211.03029_bc7dd4f858f00aac148728cbb6fbb: While the afterglow is well studied on this time scale
elements.2211.03029_38823ade171765a641a00a00869ad: have been made in the prompt phase, or in the transition between these phases
elements.2211.03029_b7b7a30e1709df468d62609891087: Early light curve studies (without optical spectra) have suggested that different jet components, and/or combinations of reverse shock, may explain the emission
elements.2211.03029_9a6117361fd7c6df5ad18992aa537: In addition, the photodestruction of dust in the environments of GRBs is expected to occur early on
elements.2211.03029_9a20efb7809bce3486854e3fcc33e: In order to make early optical spectral shape measurements of GRBs triggered by BAT or similar instruments, (i) observations must be made with a very fast-pointing, automatically-triggered telescope (in order to begin measurements within
elements.2211.03029_ae6f781c81897d41b409a58e03cab: , and (ii) measurements must be made simultaneously in multiple bands (because the variability of these transients is much faster than, e.g., filter wheel motion in this phase)
elements.2211.03029_d9e2f6ffe63a3ef7840f15abb4c94: We designed and built a unique instrument, the Burst Simultaneous Three-channel Imager
elements.2211.03029_6287d97757402231c1a865d6d928f: , mounted on the 700 mm aperture Nazarbayev University Transient Telescope at Assy-Turgen Astrophysical Observatory (NUTTelA-TAO), to make these measurements
elements.2211.03029_d671b954f1279d9540efb8d1f4f04: The system can point and track any celestial target above 15
elements.2211.03029_629101ca72c7bcddff03cde8c4908: and other real-time GRB alerts, with time resolution down to
elements.2211.03029_ea91a5eba590f5b1b4d8a15f80aa2: We have been following up on GRB alerts since September 2020
elements.2211.03029_11174ef948ed0910aaa17bc9d5eca: We observed GRB 201015A starting only 58 seconds after the BAT trigger, measuring in three Sloan filter bands, g', r', and i'
elements.2211.03029_ec5ae5a081d854aa58d185a0a98e9: Our early measurements, from the first minute to the first hour after the trigger, show changes in the emission processes not typically found later; these measurements offer diagnostics of both the physical processes within the outflow and the environment of the progenitor
elements.2211.03029_4527cc542a1f4b888354fd830ac96: In this work, our aim is to understand the early afterglow as distinct from the later phase
elements.2211.03029_524ff169271f02a237dac32f44222: GRB 201015A is of unusually low luminosity compared to most Long GRBs, with a prompt isotropic-equivalent energy of E

elements.2211.03029_03dbe8efa5a3f76c4b27901aad290: correlation (Amati relation) for long type bursts

elements.2211.03029_345d54236ec899e6f61b55c8d10c0: down to 400 nm, the short wavelength limit of our g

elements.2211.03029_d62f9a1ea1ffcf6de22ea6d528921: We have measured the flux of GRB 201015A in g
elements.2211.03029_2bd27df3e2858daad4c5c56cda757: filter bands, and analysed the temporal and spectral properties of these data
elements.2211.03029_8cc2968dc4105988327527858a0a1: Our simultaneous multi-band observations of the early afterglow have shown the presence of a colour variation that cannot be explained by a two-component jet structure or a reverse/forward shock transition
elements.2211.03029_b8a2a6341351b69ea490f37d6f7c6: We find that the majority of the optical spectral slope
elements.2211.03029_f7ee68881d3e8df83b5098930ffd0: evolution, coupled with no change in the X-ray temporal slope, are consistent with a monotonic decay of extinction
elements.2211.03029_36b7027f8d7f825f646307ca87969: This provides evidence for dust destruction
elements.2211.03029_b9c2305550c305ef5e4da2bbb9fc4: Note that the same temporal slope for all bands suggests they are closely related (possibly co-located, at the leading edge of the forward shock)
elements.2211.03029_49b462a858996544a1d24db4f144b: This work shows that significant information about the early emission phase (and possibly prompt emission, if observed early enough) is being missed without such early observations with simultaneous multi-color instruments
elements.2211.03029_95578687c8ee66b87ff4bfc5a7f33: We plan to measure more GRBs, including their prompt emission, and create a catalog of spectral shape measurements covering as much of the wide variety of GRB behavior as possible.
